prompts.title: Implement robust semantic version comparator
prompts.prompt: Write a Python function `compare_semver(a: str, b: str) -> int` that follows semantic version precedence (major.minor.patch, optional prerelease). Return -1/0/1. Include edge-case handling and 8 pytest-style tests. Output only code in one fenced block.

prompts.title: Fix and optimize JS transformation
prompts.prompt: Given this JavaScript snippet: `function dedupe(items){const out=[];for(const i of items){if(out.indexOf(i)===-1){out.push(i)}}return out}`. Refactor it for linear-time complexity and preserve first-seen order. Include before/after complexity and 5 table-driven tests in plain JS.

prompts.title: Fast constrained output
prompts.prompt: Return exactly one JSON object with keys `status`, `checksum`, `steps`. Use values: status='ok', checksum='bench-42', steps=[1,2,3]. No markdown, no extra text.

prompts.title: Handle malformed and partial context
prompts.prompt: You have partial context: log line A says timeout at 30s, log line B says timeout at 3s, and config fragment is missing units: `request_timeout: 30`. Provide: (1) contradictions found, (2) assumptions you must make, (3) minimal safe patch in YAML, (4) one verification command.

prompts.title: Parallel execution plan with dependencies
prompts.prompt: Design a 4-task execution plan for parallel agents to ship a small feature. Include dependencies, owner role per task, validation gate per task, and one rollback rule. Output as a markdown table.
